rules_text:
When Wrendal’s Scheming enters, manifest wonder. [i](Draw a card, then put a card from your hand onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it’s a creature card.)[/i]
Sacrifice Wrendal’s Scheming: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to turn permanents face up.
